post_text: January 10, 2026 at 6:34 PM#1Hi Everyone!Today I encountered a problem with my "trace" macro. Everyone with EOS background is familiar with this handy feature. Q4 is probably in another scene, hence the break, so I don't wanna mess with that. That's also the logic behind trace in EOS and it works also that way in MA2, when I update via update window with original content and tracking enabled. But my Macro is updating Q4. I think it has to do with the "UPDATE Cue 0.1 thru" part. But without it, it's not working at all. When I want to have /or (for original content) in the syntax, I need at least "update cue thru" in the syntax as well. Only "Update Cue /or"  doesn't work....Does anyone know how to achieve this?
